MIYOC is a multi-label concept store, featuring unique selections from Singapore's trendiest online fashion labels. MIYOC has a diverse mix of fashion concepts, offering you all kind of styles suitable for fun, work and play. 

High street fashion is ever changing. At MIYOC, you can find a wide mix of different labels, with a good range of exclusive designs. The labels refresh their collections weekly, guaranteeing you a different wardrobe experience every visit. 
Besides showcasing their collections, MIYOC provides parcel collection service for online blogshops. Our service is best known for its convenience, simplicity and security. Nowhere else in town that you could collect your parcels from the online shopping sprees at your convenience that easily. 


Enjoy your shopping with MIYOC today!
